# Flutter Riverpod Snippets
*.dart

# Provider snippet
provider → Provider<Type>((ref) { });

# StateNotifier snippet
statenotifier → class MyNotifier extends StateNotifier<MyState> { }

# FutureProvider snippet
futureprovider → FutureProvider<Type>((ref) async { });

# StreamProvider snippet
streamprovider → StreamProvider<Type>((ref) { });

# ConsumerWidget snippet
consumerwidget → class MyWidget extends ConsumerWidget { }

# ConsumerStatefulWidget snippet
consumerstatefulwidget → class MyWidget extends ConsumerStatefulWidget { }

# Freezed Model snippet
freezed → @freezed class MyModel with _$MyModel { }
